title: Fully Renovated unit w/ Balcony!
posting_body: ['For viewing, please call Gloria:', '510 area code 323 - 2292.', 'An upstairs unit, 1 bedroom with an office space, 1 bath has been fully renovated.', 'Fresh paint throughout the unit along with new flooring.', 'The kitchen has all new counters, cabinets, refrigerator and gas-stove.', 'The bath has been fully remodeled as well and includes a new tub and vanity set.', 'Closet space in the hall.', 'Beautiful balcony that allows lots of natural light.', 'Pet negotiable with references and increase on security deposit.', 'Fenced community with a big courtyard.', 'Security deposit: $3,585.', 'No smoking.', '1-year lease requirement.', "Tenant's are responsible for pg&e.", 'Renters insurance with $300,000 in liability & the owner added as additionally insured, is required.', 'Minimum of 650 credit score and minimum income level of 2.5x the rental amount are also required.', 'FMI Inc.', 'Jan Feagley, Certified Property Manager - DRE 00777442']
